channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Mailwise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Mailwise

item.title: CVE-2018-0558|2024-08-05T03:28:11.266Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20mailwise
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Mailwise 5.0.0 to 5.4.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML in 'System settings' via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0557|2024-08-05T03:28:11.218Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20mailwise
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Mailwise 5.0.0 to 5.4.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML 'E-mail Details Screen' via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0702|2024-08-05T03:35:48.997Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20mailwise
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Cybozu Mailwise 5.0.0 to 5.4.5 allows remote attackers to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0559|2024-08-05T03:28:11.207Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20mailwise
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Mailwise 5.0.0 to 5.4.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML 'Address' via unspecified vectors.
